text:
(1) Plumb Island, south side, viewed westward from Point Breeze, showing Sheepshead Bay in the background. Note the steeple of St. Mark's R.C. Church located on Ave. Z and Ocean Ave. In the foreground is a couple of shacks near which are a group of canoes ready for a race.
July 7, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.

(2) The same, viewed in the opposite direction.
July 7, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.

(3) The same, a more easterly view of No. 1.
April 29, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
title: Islands - Plumb Island (South side) - Point Breeze - Brooklyn.
